summary: Lignum Vitae - Pockholz New armor for males and females
descriptionHtml:
Welcome to my new armor mod for males and females

please read the instructions

this is a new kind of armor
its made from the hardest wood of the world
the name of the wood it´s Lignum Vitae or/and Pockwood.

This wood its very hard and heavy for a wood,it can not even float
but it´s weighs less than iron or steel.
So this is a Light armor with a litle bit more weight as the usual light armors
I think this mod is very lore friendly

The status of the armor is somthing between glass and dragonscale.
to forge the armor on the smithing forge you must go under the category miscellaneous

It is also not so easy to forge this armor 
because you first need to have the Glass smithing perk 
and the right materials 
some of them are not so easy to get.

you need:
taproot
steel
leather
leatherstripes
firewood
dragonscales
and ebony (to temper)

the armor contents:
helmet
cuirass
gauntlets
boots
shield

The armor also has the same magic power as the ebonymail cuirass
if you go on the crouch position you will see what happent:-)

To install please use the Modmanager

or install manually,copy and paste the files to the right directory

If you like this mod an wish also a Heavy version of it, just tell me
and if many people whants this,then i will make it for you

I whant to thank Madcat for his permission to use the helmet of his open faced helmets mod
to find in http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/4866

this mod is free to use for everyone,you can do whatever you like with this
just cedit me as the creator of the original mod
exept the helmet,
this belongs to madcat

It was a really hard work 
so please endorse if you like my mod
i post your pictures please

this is the only think you can do to say thank you
to people like me who create mod´s for all of you

special thanks to bethesda for this amazing game
